name: RedFlagDeals (RFD) Classic
description:
Brings back the older, more compact look of RFD. Re-uses some of the old CSS.

In forum thread list: less whitespace, same font and font sizes as before, removed "Current" and "Trending" tabs, removed excess information under each thread like dates, #upvotes, etc. In individual threads: removed giant banner at the top and replaced with just the title, decreased font size slightly, decreased red post info banner height/font slightly, changed post font from grey to black, made background colours in posts the same as before. Both bottom footers are gone.
